products.title: Rockhampton Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: Opulent themes flow gorgeously through the rockhampton pearl roman blind, adding a sprinkling of fairy dust to everything it sees. With a gentle flecked texture in creamy, incandescent tones, fading into the satin fabric, this blind is playing for keeps, and winning.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Hampton Sheer Cream
products.description: Hampton sheer perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. This sheer light filtering fabric is ideal for daytime privacy, creating a cool ambience to any room. Perfect fit pleated blind hampton sheer cream available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Hampton Cream - Translucent Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their pleated hampton range, comes in light neutral shades. Perfect for sprucing up your loft or conservatory without the light loss from blackout fabric. A screen fabric, this faric is great for getting some uv protection without sacrificing natural light. Product id: db-pls0112 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows.
